thread.section_title: MCM Electronics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MCM Electronics | www.mcmelectronics.com
thread.title: Larry Jenkins
thread.title_full: MCM Electronics reviewed by Larry Jenkins

author: Larry Jenkins
title: Larry Jenkins
text:
I ordered your 55-1455 Sub Woofer. Great product.
Although my Order was quite small in comparison to your other Orders, I had some questions.
Scott Keffer answered all my questions in a very professional manner. It was apparent quite quickly that he knew his products well. He never commented on what a small Order mine was. He just did his job. Very well.. An asset to your Company.
